verses.text: Behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* my \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w*, and he shall \w prepare|strong="H6437"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me: and the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, whom ye \w seek|strong="H1245"\w*, shall \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, even the \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, whom ye \w delight|strong="H2655"\w* in: behold, he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

But who may \w abide|strong="H3557"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w coming|strong="H0935"\w*? and who shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* when he \w appeareth|strong="H7200"\w*? for he \add is\add* like a \w refiner’s|strong="H6884"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and like \w fullers’|strong="H3526"\w* \w soap|strong="H1287"\w*:

And he shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \add as\add* a \w refiner|strong="H6884"\w* and \w purifier|strong="H2891"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*: and he shall \w purify|strong="H2891"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, and \w purge|strong="H2212"\w* them as \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, that they may \w offer|strong="H5066"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* in \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

Then shall the \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* be \w pleasant|strong="H6149"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*, and as in \w former|strong="H6931"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 3.4 \ft former: or, ancient\f*

And I will come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to you to \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; and I will be a \w swift|strong="H4116"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against the \w sorcerers|strong="H3784"\w*, and against the \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w*, and against \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w swearers|strong="H7650"\w*, and against those that \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* the \w hireling|strong="H7916"\w* in \add his\add* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*, the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, and the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and that turn \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \add from his right\add*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not me, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 3.5 \ft oppress: or, defraud\f*

For I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I \w change|strong="H8138"\w* not; therefore ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* are not \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.

¶ Even from the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* ye are gone \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from mine \w ordinances|strong="H2706"\w*, and have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \add them\add*. \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, and I will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto you, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. But ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherein shall we \w return|strong="H7725"\w*?

¶ Will a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w rob|strong="H6906"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? Yet ye have \w robbed|strong="H6906"\w* me. But ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherein have we \w robbed|strong="H6906"\w* thee? In \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* and \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w*.
Ye \add are\add* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* with a \w curse|strong="H3994"\w*: for ye have \w robbed|strong="H6906"\w* me, \add even\add* this whole \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w Bring|strong="H0935"\w* ye all the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* into the \w storehouse|strong="H0214"\w*, that there may be \w meat|strong="H2964"\w* in mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w prove|strong="H0974"\w* me now \w herewith|strong="H2063"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, if I will not \w open|strong="H6605"\w* you the \w windows|strong="H0699"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and pour you \w out|strong="H7324"\w* a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*, that \add there shall\add* not \add be room\add* \w enough|strong="H1767"\w* \add to receive it\add*.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft pour…: Heb. empty out\f*

And I will \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* the \w devourer|strong="H0398"\w* for your sakes, and he shall not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w* of your \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*; neither shall your \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* cast her \w fruit|strong="H7921"\w* before the time in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft destroy: Heb. corrupt\f*

And all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall call you \w blessed|strong="H0833"\w*: for ye shall be a \w delightsome|strong="H2656"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ Your \w words|strong="H1697"\w* have been \w stout|strong="H2388"\w* against me, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Yet ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, What have we \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add so much\add* against thee?

Ye have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and what \w profit|strong="H1215"\w* \add is it\add* that we have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* his \w ordinance|strong="H4931"\w*, and that we have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w mournfully|strong="H6941"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*?\f + \fr 3.14 \ft ordinance: Heb. observation\f*\f + \fr 3.14 \ft mournfully: Heb. in black\f*

And now we \w call|strong="H0833"\w* the \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* \w happy|strong="H0833"\w*; yea, they that \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* are set \w up|strong="H1129"\w*; yea, \add they that\add* \w tempt|strong="H0974"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* are even \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft are set up: Heb. are built\f*

¶ Then they that \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* spake \w often|strong="H1696"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w hearkened|strong="H7181"\w*, and \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, and a \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w* was \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him for them that \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and that \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* upon his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

And they shall be mine, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when I make \w up|strong="H6213"\w* my \w jewels|strong="H5459"\w*; and I will \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* them, as a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w spareth|strong="H2550"\w* his own \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that \w serveth|strong="H5647"\w* him.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft jewels: or, special treasure\f*

Then shall ye \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w discern|strong="H7200"\w* between the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, between him that \w serveth|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* and him that \w serveth|strong="H5647"\w* him not.
